Title: Host-Only Policy Enforcement
Description:
No founder exposure; proxy agents for all public comms.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All external materials list host only
- Founder name absent from all public docs
- Proxy email/phone configured
- Review checklist for new materials

Title: Threat Model Documentation
Description:
Document doxxing, harassment, spear-phishing, deepfake risks.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All threat vectors documented
- Mitigations mapped per threat
- Monitoring systems identified
- Response procedures defined

Title: Surface Minimization Audit
Description:
Inventory and reduce public touchpoints.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All public touchpoints inventoried
- High-risk items removed/obfuscated
- Separate domains/emails configured
- Entity structure documented

Title: Privacy Infrastructure Setup
Description:
Separate domains, emails, PO boxes, entities.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All infrastructure provisioned
- Access controls configured
- Documentation complete
- Tested for leakage

Title: NDA and Legal Document Suite
Description:
NDAs, terms, privacy policy with counsel sign-off.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- All documents counsel-signed
- Version control active
- Distribution tracked
- Enforcement runbooks written

Title: Takedown Procedure Development
Description:
Legal templates and rapid response workflows.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Templates for major platforms
- Response SLA defined
- Evidence preservation process
- Escalation contacts listed

Title: Crisis Drill Execution
Description:
Incident simulations with comms trees.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- At least 2 drills completed
- Hotwash reports filed
- Improvements logged
- Retest scheduled

Title: Brand Monitoring Automation
Description:
Brand mentions, domain lookups, image/video flags.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Monitoring tools configured
- Alerts to designated channels
- Auto-create incidents in Linear
- Daily digest reports

Title: Access Proxying System
Description:
Role-based keys with session recording.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Proxied access for public-facing ops
- Sessions recorded and stored
- Revocation scripts tested
- Audit log complete

Title: Legal Template Injector
Description:
Pre-approved responses and takedown sequences.

**Acceptance Criteria:**
- Response library complete
- Templates version controlled
- Preservation workflow integrated
- One-click deployment tested
